## AuthContainer.loginOAuthProviderWithAccessToken() method

Login with OAuth SSO provider using access token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loginOAuthProviderWithAccessToken(providerID: string, accessToken: string, options?: SSOLoginOptions): Promise<User>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  providerID | <code>string</code> | SSO provider ID |
|  accessToken | <code>string</code> | SSO provider access token |
|  options | <code>SSOLoginOptions</code> | SSO login options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<User>`

## Remarks

This feature must be enabled in configuration, otherwise it will fail.
